description: Ministry of Urban Development Water Supply and Drainage - Order to approve the acquisition of the immovable properties in Meegaswatta, Padiyathalawa D/S Division, Ampara District for the constructions under Padiyathalawa Water Supply Scheme; in Atampitiya Watta, Hali Ela D/S Division, Badulla District for the Construction under Atampitiya Water Supply Scheme and in Kuttapitiya, Pelmadulla D/S Division, Ratnapura District for the Constructions under Pelmadulla Water Supply Scheme and in Dippitiya, Akurana D/S Division, Kandy District for the constructions under Kandy North - Pathadumbara Integrated Water Supply Project
